text: These Days (it. Questi giorni) is a 2016 Italian drama film directed by Giuseppe Piccioni. It was selected to compete for the Golden Lion at the 73rd Venice International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Laura Adriani as Angela * Margherita Buy as Adria * Giulio Corso as Valerio * Marta Gastini as Caterina * Caterina Le Caselle as Caterina * Maria Roveran as Liliana * Filippo Timi as Professor Mariani * Sergio Rubini as Angela's father ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 films Category:2016 drama films Category:Italian films Category:Italian drama films Category:Italian-language films Category:Films directed by Giuseppe Piccioni
title: Questi giorni
